title: Sound On: Robust March Jobs, Pizza Principle, Title 42
itunes:title: Sound On: Robust March Jobs, Pizza Principle, Title 42
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Congressman Jason Smith of Missouri, Ed Mills, Washington Policy Analyst and Managing Director at Raymond James, Joe Crowley, former New York Congressman and Democratic Caucus Chair and Bloomberg politics contributor Rick Davis.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
